column5: Finishing up some brackets for the boat using 1.5" square tubing etc. Thought some plastic end caps would be nice but can't seem to find locally in Hamilton.  I have struck out so far with the usual big box stores in the area.  Easy to find online but hoping just to pick some up.  Any hints would be appreciated.
https://www.amazon.ca/s/ref=nb_sb_noss?url=search-alias%3Daps&field-keywords=1.5+square+tube+caps  Amazon is your friend. lol   Art
Try home hardware. They may not have in stock, but you would be surprised what they can get in.  If your still having problems, give me a pm. See what I can do with some contacts.

If you can't find any let me know; I bought some from a store here in London called Facca Fasteners. They were for 1 " square tube but the display board had larger ones. The store is like 5 minutes from me; I could pick them up and mail them to you. We'll worry about payment after we know the cost; but they're inexpensive.  Dan.
Thanks guys you are great. I'm on the hunt now locally before asking for favors...
Give Fastenal a call - there are a few in Hamilton depending on where you are

Home Depot might have them too... they had a selection of round ones in the fastener isle. in with furniture building accessories.  Most fastener or industrial supply places (fastenal, bolts plus, acklands, brafasco,spaneur, etc) should either have them, or access to them....
